attributes.action: UK Government must offer South Africans of European descent a "right to return"
attributes.background: With South African white farmers being raped and murdered on a near daily basis while South African government officials openly declaring they will be taking land without compensation, South Africans of European descent are facing a bleak future and possible genocide.

rejection.details: People from South Africa are already able to apply for a visa to live and work in the UK, so we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do.
